title: Provides that inspection reports on dam safety conform to existing public disclosure laws
summary: Provides that inspection reports on dam safety conform to existing public disclosure laws.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          26

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CAHILL -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Environmental Conservation

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  environmental  conservation law, in relation to
         inspection reports on dam safety

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  1  of  section  15-0516 of the environmental
    2  conservation law, as added by chapter 17 of the laws of 2006, is amended
    3  to read as follows:
    4    1. Within thirty days  of  the  creation  by  the  department  of  any
    5  inspection report of any intermediate or high hazard dam, the department
    6  shall provide, to the chief executive officer of a municipality in which
    7  the  dam  is  located,  a copy of such report. Such report shall also be
    8  furnished to the chief executive officer of any  other  municipality  in
    9  the county where the dam is located, or any county adjoining such county
   10  upon  written  request  of  the  chief executive officer of such munici-
   11  pality. PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THAT ANY INSPECTION REPORT  ISSUED  SHALL  BE
   12  VETTED TO CONFORM TO THE EXISTING PUBLIC DISCLOSURE LAWS, AS PROVIDED IN
   13  ARTICLE SIX OF THE PUBLIC OFFICERS LAW.
   14    S  2.  This  act  shall take effect immediately and shall be deemed to
   15  have been in full force and effect on and after March 28, 2006.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01047-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to inspection reports on dam safety
